en.description: Create or update existing metadata for GIS datasets

overwrite.description: Overwrite existing metadata information; default is do not overwrite.

summary.description: A short summary stating the purpose of this data.

tags.description: Keywords that can be used to search for this data.

description.description: A brief narrative of the data, also known as an abstract.

credits.description: The recognition of those who created or contributed to the data (e.g. Voyager Search).

constraints.description: The use limitations and copyright information.
